articles.title: Witcher: Blood Origin trailer: Michelle Yeoh’s sword elf arrives in December - Polygon
articles.description: Netflix’s Witcher prequel series Blood Origin takes place 1,200 years before the main series and stars Michelle Yeoh as a sword-elf in the latest trailer. The series will release on Dec. 25.
articles.content: The Witcher prequel series arrives on Christmas
